str2: To use, make use of, deal with, take advantage of.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from the base of komizo; orderly arrangement, i.e. Decoration; by implication, the world (morally).
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To use to the full, use up. From kata and chraomai; to overuse, i.e. Misuse.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
Probably from the base of komizo; orderly arrangement, i.e. Decoration; by implication, the world (morally).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Fashion, habit, form, appearance. From the alternate of echo; a figure, i.e. external condition.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To pass by, depart, pass away. From para and ago; to lead near, i.e. to go along or away.
